alert.note: Alert for Barry; Calhoun; Eaton; Kalamazoo (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 4:10PM EDT until June 25 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Calhoun County in south central Michigan... Eastern Barry County in southwestern Michigan... Northeastern Kalamazoo County in southwestern Michigan... Southwestern Eaton County in south central Michigan... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 409 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Battle Creek, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Charlotte... Hastings... Battle Creek... Nashville... Bellevue... Climax... Level Park-Oak Park... Brownlee Park... Assyria... Kalamo... Olivet... Augusta... Vermontville... Banfield... W K Kellogg Airport... Pine Creek... Dowling... Bedford... Ceresco... Scotts... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
